medical_history.chief_complaint: Pain at left flank and abdomen
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain developed suddenly approximately 4 days ago while doing yardwork. It has been constant and relatively unchanged since then. The patient reports that trying to get up from sitting or standing makes the pain worse. He denies any nausea/vomiting, diarrhea, constipation, or fever/chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Rheumatoid arthritis on methotrexate, coronary artery disease (CAD) status post coronary artery bypass graft (CABG), bilateral carotid stenosis status post carotid endarterectomy (CEA) and stenting, prostate cancer status post radiation, microcytic anemia, chronic renal insufficiency.
